long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ultimate dream of speech recognition is to enable people to effectively interact with the modern computer systems and to provide a basic human-computer interaction with simple techniques and tools. Some of these typical
applications include voice dialling, call routing, data entry and dictation, command and email writing with speech aid. With the help of "Automic" the speech will be automatically converted to text and provide the users with hectic free solution to the speech processing. This will help users increase their typing speed and will reduce typographical errors. With the technique used the extension takes the input from the user, can be in different ascent, pitch, volume etc. and converts it into text and also pastes into the area specified by the user.
